remarks: A coefficient of a univariate polynomial over a class/ring is an element of this class/ring.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2019.)
statement:
coe1fval.a $e |- A = ( coe1 ` F ) $.
coe1f.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
coe1f.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1f.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
coe1fvalcl $p |- ( ( F e. B /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( A ` N ) e. K ) $.
